resources.string: Welcome to the DroidPI phone benchmarking application!
A simple test which computes a large amount of the digits of PI to test your processor\nTap the button below when you wish to start the test
Because 3.14 is too abrupt an end...
Computing all the digits of PI and then some
Enough digits have been computed to rule the world\nThe result of the test:
A test which assesses your device\'s thread handling capabilities\nTap the button below when you wish to start the test
Launch enough threads to rule the world
Putting the complexity of the universe to shame through multithreading
Almost lost sight of reality there for a sec\nThe result of the test:
A test which gauges your device\'s arithmetic capabilities.\nTap the button below when you wish to start the test
Please wait while we compute the distance to infinity
Crunched so many numbers I now have a 6-pack\nYour results were:
This test focuses on testing your phone\'s recursion capabilities\nTap the button below when you wish to start the test
Please wait while we\'re repeating ourselves
I hope that stutter ww..wares off eventually\nYour results were:
